traits.Trampling Charge: If the triceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.Stomp: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage
